title: 03/01/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/01/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the guys return from the weekend and jump right into talks surrounding the futures of Dak Prescott, Russell Wilson and Drew Brees. NFL Network’s Jane Slater joined the show to talk about the Cowboys’ future and how it would be very complicated to put together any trade involving Russell Wilson. Saints Columnist Jeff Duncan hopped on the show in the second hour to continue the conversation surrounding Drew Brees. While it’s not a 0% chance he will come back in 2021, it’s very likely we’ve seen the last of him on the football field. Lastly, ahead of his fight, NBA legend Shaquille O’Neal joined the show to talk about the upcoming match as well as how players in the current NBA are too soft to handle criticism.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the guys return from the weekend and jump right into talks surrounding the futures of Dak Prescott, Russell Wilson and Drew Brees. NFL Network’s Jane Slater joined the show to talk about the Cowboys’ future and how it would be very complicated to put together any trade involving Russell Wilson. Saints Columnist Jeff Duncan hopped on the show in the second hour to continue the conversation surrounding Drew Brees. While it’s not a 0% chance he will come back in 2021, it’s very likely we’ve seen the last of him on the football field. Lastly, ahead of his fight, NBA legend Shaquille O’Neal joined the show to talk about the upcoming match as well as how players in the current NBA are too soft to handle criticism.
